means: 遥感勘测，自动测量记录传导

word_mean: 远距测定法，遥测术：远距离检测技术，测得资料由放射信号传送

sentence.Network_en: This telemetry streamed back to earth.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种遥测系统源源不断地送回地面.

sentence.Network_en: Rockets use a system known as telemetry to relay their information to earth.
sentence.Network_cn: 火箭用一个称为遥测技术装置的系统,把它们的信息传给地面.

sentence.Network_en: While telemetry is not a recording method, it is closely aligned with recording.
sentence.Network_cn: 虽然遥测技术并不是一种记录方法, 但它与记录是密切相关的.

entry.def: Telemetry is the science of using automatic equipment to make scientific measurements and transmit them by radio to a receiving station.

means.word_mean: 1. automatic transmission and measurement of data from remote sources by wire or radio or other means

auth_sentence.content: Their adjacency takes them from mechanical to human telemetry.
